name: The Spy
description: The Spy is an Uncommon Hyperion SMG from the base game that trades damage and handling for a critical bonus. It offers a small crit boost but worse damage, reload speed, and spread, plus a heavier movement penalty while scoped.

special.red: I spy with my little eye...
special.description: Adds about +35% critical damage but lowers damage and reload speed with wider spread, and doubles the movement-speed penalty while scoped.
